ch.pschatzmann.jflightcontroller4pi.tuning

Class HeartBeatSensor

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.pschatzmann.jflightcontroller4pi.tuning.HeartBeatSensor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDevice, ISensor

    public class HeartBeatSensor
extends java.lang.Object
implements ISensor
    We try to make sure that filghtgear is running and prividing actual data. We do this by checking the last update of the pitch sensor.
    Author:
    pschatzmann
